Guardian Irene:
I'm sorry, you haven't done as much as you have promised to. You must complete as much as you have agreed to.
Please use the Purified Water to purge the Flower Buds in the Enchanted Valley, defeat 60 Enraged Nymph Rose, Enraged Nymph Lilly, Enraged Nymph Tulip, and Enraged Nymph Cosmos that appear. Come back after you have completed this.
